cards.title: The Astrology Collection, My Personal Projects
cards.description: Astrology is a collection of my ideas and personal projects. I like to built things in my spare time. Writing computer programs is a great way to build things. However, engineering is more than software...
cards.caption: Lights, New York City

cards.title: Application Projects
cards.description: I helped different people to implement various applications, like database, or websites. These projects are usually more reliable and intended to improve the productivity.
cards.caption: Montauk Point, NY

cards.title: Research Projects
cards.description: Being in the school for a long time, I also work on exploratory projects. These projects may not become applications eventually. However, they help us explore the unknown territories
cards.caption: Arecibo Observatory, PR
